name: So I Am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path?
author: 猫仆工作室
content: The almighty Yun-Ye is now reaching the end of his life. As the eight factions that have claimed to be righteous knew about the end of Yun-Ye&#039s life, they launched an attack against him. At the same time, a person with the same name has traversed and took over the body along with a system, and he has now started the path to eliminate evil and spread righteousness. Yun-Ye is able to earn points by completing system missions, then use them to trade for vitality. He will then slowly lead his si
